References: For more information about the ASAS-SN project, see the ASAS-SN Homepage and the list of all ASAS-SN transients.
Event Type: discovery of a transient source, likely a supernova
Telescope: quadruple 14-cm 'Brutus' telescope, Planewave CDK 0.43-m telescope, RCOS 51-cm telescope
Observatory: Haleakala, Hawaii; near Mayhill, New Mexico
